channel.title: How do i use mage spells etc. look inside
channel.description: ok i need to know how to use mage spell and switch to antients spell book and use the spells that are there. and how do i get specs and run my moparscape server on my source(Cheezscape PK 78)

item.dc:creator: @Runescape_Project Runescape Project
item.description:
@Runescape_Project wrote:

[quote=“zezimaisme111, post:7, topic:166161”][quote author=Yxer link=topic=225325.msg1941870#msg1941870 date=1198193054]

i dont have the ::switch thing and when i click on a spell and on the npc it does nothing. and i only have the runserver and compile. when i run the compile it says “javac” is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file. and when i run the “runserver” thing it opens and closes really fast.

i dont have the ::switch thing and when i click on a spell and on the npc it does nothing. and i only have the runserver and compile. when i run the compile it says “javac” is not recognized as an internal or external command,operable program or batch file. and when i run the “runserver” thing it opens and closes really fast.

Twice of the same crap, why?
[/quote][quote author=Runescape Project link=topic=225325.msg1941888#msg1941888 date=1198194325]
copied and pasted duh and if your not gonna help dont post.
but i still need help please some one.
[/quote]
not aloud…
and if you only have compile and run, theres no server dumbass[/quote]
stfu and can someone just pleas help me out anyway they can. i need to know how to get my moparscape server to run with Cheezscape PK 78 so if you can help then please do so but if you cant then please dont post

item.title: How do i use mage spells etc. look inside
item.dc:creator: @webbsta webbsta
item.description:
@webbsta wrote:

go to your commands and under the final bracket of a command add this:

if (command.startsWith("switch")){
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage("You convert to normal magic!");
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage("You convert to ancient magicks!");
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: How do i use mage spells etc. look inside
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

[quote=“Runescape Project, post:1, topic:166161”]ok i need to know how to use mage spell and switch to antients spell book and use the spells that are there.
and how do i get specs and run my moparscape server on my source(Cheezscape PK 78)[/quote]

Ok in my opinion, i think you should concentrate on one thing at a time.

If you can’t run your server, you can’t do anything. So in your server folder, you will see a .batch file. Which will have ‘Run’ ‘Restarter’ ‘Compile’ on it, or something similar. Click on that and it should say, starting (SERVER) on 0.0.0.0:43594 or starting Cheezscape on 0.0.0.0:5555. Then on your client, put the ip adress to 0.0.0.0, and the port number to 43594/5555. Which ever number follows the colon.

Specials, i suggest you learn a bit more of Java before even attempting to add specials.

Magic spells, just click the spell book, click a spell, then click your enemy.

Switching spell books, you should have a command like ::switch. If you don’t, post back.

Read full topic
